replyContent: The free app is likely only temporary in order for users like you to switch off to the new app. Sorry we had to make a new app for P2 as DJI dropped support for it in the new SDK version. Please consider updating your rating.

content: The new update crashed, would like to go back to last ver. that works! Support was very quick to get me back up and running, THANK YOU!
replyContent: Please contact support@flylitchi.com

content: Worth every cent.  I may be drone rich but i'm money poor but despite that I will GLADLY pay more for future added features.  It makes perfect sence to charge additional money and PLEASE do.  I need the dev to be incentivised!  If you have a inspire or phantom 3 but you don't fly with this app then you are flying in the stone age and should be embarrassed.
Liked it.  but it would be better only pay once when we already purchased.
This is so much easier to use than the dji app.  The only thing missing, or I'm unable to find is a gimbal calibration function.
I love it thanks a lot
Works perfect so far, easy to plan flights yet I wish Litci will add "planed flight simulation" to test and assure my flights plan prior to flight real execution.

This the greatest app made for the dji phantom series nothing to say but good things about it brings all those goody feature from the phantom 3 series to the phantom 2 series which I love so so much, keep up the good work awesome app.
When will u update so it will work with the phantom 3 standard
replyContent: P3 Standard support should be released this week.

content: Not much to differentiate this from the DJI standard app. The only difference I could find, is the follow me and google carboard support. The follow me (another $6) does tilt up and down, don't think standard app does. But the  google cardboard movement activation only tilts, doesn't pan. In fact it crashed once. Also locked me out in f-mode once. Also takes over default USB launch despite not being set as default and prevents other app from ever getting to my P3 until I close app and reset app defaults.
Just kept disconnecting from WiFi every 20 to 30 seconds. Got a refund. Would probably buy again if it was fixed. Phantom 2 vision plus version 3. Nvidia shield k1

Nothing but good things to say about this app.  I've only used it a few times but it is virtually effortless.  Mapping out waypoints, using orbit mode, follow me, etc are all very intuitive.  The layout and design of the app is great as well.  It's great to be able to map out my mission ahead of time, save it, get to the location, and load up the mission I saved earlier.  It even caches the maps for offline use.  I had a slight problem getting connected the first time (for licensing purposes) but I only had to switch to a different internet connection (the DJI vehicle did not have to be present for this) and after that it worked fine.  Great app and superior in every way to DJI's own app.
replyContent: Try a different internet connection, this is how people who get that issue solve the problem. Unfortunately some internet connections do not allow connection to the DJI sdk licensing servers in china. This is only needed the first start after installation

content: Everytime I open the app it says it's unlicenced. Wasted my money.
replyContent: Please contact support@flylitchi.com if you need help.

content: works extremely well always new and better updates.

App seems like a very good alternative to the DJI Go app, but I fail to connect to my Phantom 3 Advanced. Even after clearing the defaults on the DJI Go app, and I've tried various internet connections. Thankfully I've been refunded until VC Technology can assist with an answer.  Samsung Galaxy S5
replyContent: If you need help, please contact support@flylitchi.com

content: App crashed half a dozen times and then won't connect.
replyContent: Please make sure to switch to a different video decoder if having crash issues. Contact support@flylitchi.com for more help

content: It has everything I wanted and more! There's even more camera settings than DJI Go which was on my wishlist. Would've paid more if I knew how much was included. S6 Edge + and Nvidia Shield K-1

Why are you taking away the Phantom 2 Vision + support? The majority of people who got you where you are own Phantom 2's and that's who you designed the software for! Good money was paid and now your taking our support away...NOT GOOD!!!
replyContent: We are not taking away P2V+ support, where did you see that? If you are referring to the beta version, we will have more news for P2V+ users at a later stage, but for now you should opt out of beta testing.

content: First off a request to the developers: Can you develop your software to accommodate a phone camera view via one of the back buttons on the Phantom 3 Pro controller? It would be great to fly using your goggle mode then hit the button and go to phone camera mode to see in front of you. Also maybe incorporate a full screen goggle mode, split of course for when you want to see all the info. Ideally a 3 hit button to give me in goggle mode 1. VR mode 2.phone camera mode and 3. Full screen mode(split for goggle use). Are you planning on utilizing the mode in DJI 3D that when you rotate your head the P3 rotates? Now my review...GREAT...GREAT...GREAT!! Love it! You have so many more options than DJI Go! 31 channel, Quick buttons for programmable functions, Way points without flying them first, the list goes on and on. Also we found out the way point function will work even if after starting you accidentally unplug your pad. Goggle use review: I use a set of VR goggles off Amazon (VR Box) that are $22.00. The head tilt tied to the gimble is fantastic as is the view. In theory it works great but having to pull off the VR goggles and yank out the phone when wanting an open view is touchy.
Don't buy this stupid app. This piece of crap app just caused our P3 to bang in wall. Not ever going to trust these guys again.
Move to SD would be really nice......
Work very well on tab s2.
Hi there this seems like an amazing app all in all buy I always get an error when trying out the gs mode which does not allow it to take off
replyContent: This could be due to an outdated firmware, please contact support@flylitchi.com for more help

content: Best app for flying P3P with Android! Clear, easy user interfaces. Easy sync with healthy drones and mission hub to view, track and plan your flights. Great support from VC Tech. Worth 10 times the price!
Great app

Just used the app, fantastic features but the app crashed 3 times on one flight. App crashed on subsequent flights. I will need to send them my logs. Can't wait to get a stable version because it's better than the DJI Go by leaps and bounds for waypoints.
replyContent: Have you tried changing video decoder setting in Settings - Camera?

content: But please add some basic features. I really miss the dji go feature that caches the light bridge video feed on my phone or tablet. This could really help if things go wrong.
Focus does not work with my drone, but this is such a great app!! Worth every penny! !
Would not connect to Internet to verify the app
replyContent: Hello, this happens with some internet connections which refuse to connect to DJI servers, we suggest trying with a different internet connection

content: An Excellent Alternative to DJI GO
Fantastic application, intuitive GUI and packed full of features...puts the rest to shame
Awesome app. Only thing I don't like is paying $20 for an app then paying more for new features.   This is a premium app and the $20 should cover any new features added to it.
Far superior than DJI pilot app..
Great app
Perfect for groundstation missions
The best app to fly under a mission planner

This App is really useful. I have a DJI P3 Pro and I am finding that I am using this Litchi app almost always to fly instead of the DGI Go App.  There are still a very few DJI Go App parameters that I am not able (yet) to change or control in the Litchi App. This Litchi App is wonderful! Well worth the $20. Keep up the good development work. Also the link to the Healthy Drones is a very useful web site too. This combo sure makes flying the P3P interesting!  Cheers, Joe KC7GHT
If djigo don't work on your tablet, you can buy this app to flight.

Crashes every time when  switching from photo to video. Sent several crash reports with no responses. Using on a Samsung  Tab,new no issues  with  DJIGO. Need refund but I guess I am SOL, as I  can not even get support to help.
replyContent: We reply every email, if you did not get an answer, that means we did not receive your emails.

content: Lowered my rating due to the camera view mode on my phone no longer works. Have a very hard time getting the drone to show the camera on phone or tablet. Bad updates
Beautiful, full featured app for the Phantom and Inspire drones. I've been using litchi since it was beta and have always been impressed with its features and performance.
please tell us HOW you mod the gear VR so we can use the awesome VR mode, COME ON !

I've got Litchi running on two of my devices. I've purchased the Focus option on my main tablet. But it doesn't seem to be enabled for my second device? It gives me the option to purchase on the second tablet, but if I click OK to buy, Google Play tells me that I already own it? I've already restarted the app several times, with internet access so it should be able to do the license check...how can this be corrected?
Easy to use and works great👍 Inspire 1

Works great on my cheap proscan tablet,  no lag and no crashes.   Ground Station is really cool,  almost a must have for great videos,  it allows you to concentrate on the camera while the phantom flies itself
I restarted everything a couple of times, and now it seems to be connected. I haven't flown it yet.
Thank you litchi for making a app that i can always relay on. No worries when i send my V2+ out on its own. Best app going. Thanks for the continuous improvements. Doesnt get much better.
Old version there is altitude option ...more than 500m.. also add flying simulator

It doesn't show compass error message as in the DJI GO. When the error occurs, the motors can't be turned on and I need to find out the error myself by using DJI GO. Another issue I found is that  I didn't see the video cache function as in DJI GO, it might cause difficulties to find out what happened with the aircraft in case I lost it somewhere.
in GS mode, I can't get the "take photo" working. it shows Take Photo : N/A.  Did I miss out something ?
replyContent: N/A for Take Photo is normal. It means the action parameter is not applicable for this type of action.

content: At first I was a bit skeptical about spending $20 on the app. Especially when many of the features are in the newer DJI GO app... After buying the app I can see why many folks are using it. The waypointing with camera automation is awesome.

This is  decent app but it crashes constantly on me. As soon as I launched it the first time it crashed almost immediately.  Restarted and after about 30 seconds it crashed again.  Reboot and relaunched and no issues.  Took it for a test spin and had no issues during flight with P3 thankfully.  On second attempted flight the app crashed again so I am not comfortable using this while my drone is in the air.  For some reason can't get refund now.  Using Note 5 if that makes any difference.
Why cant i use it with PHANTOM 3 standard?  Will you make it possible to soon?     That link for forum wont open,can you try it again? Any other way to find it when im on google group?
replyContent: Please use our forum at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/vctechplus to discuss with us.

content: Amazing app. Can achieve cinematic shots previously only possible with a 2 person rig
Can i set the Phantom3p to go home in orbit mode if i lost connection and not to continue orbit? I almost crash today.
replyContent: This is not possible sorry, this is limited by DJI's firmware.

content: Please, please, please could you add a mapping tool!!!! That would make litchi the most complete solution for P3/I1. Fantastic app.
Love this. It makes waypoints and others so much easier to use. And the panoramic function is basically a couple quick taps.  Just need to figure out how to store low res video on my device!
Best dji app by a mile, developers are on to fixing any minor bugs as well as adding new features

The app is pretty comparable to the stock DJI app now that DJI has been adding stuff. Still they want 20 dollars for this and it still doesn't unlock everything. To unlock focus mode for instance it's ANOTER 5 bucks. Come on. That is just being greedy. For a second I thought this was made by EA I got this for the VR mode and found out it is pretty much 100% incompatible with the Gear VR 2015. Waste of money and I can't even get a refund because it went past the 30 min timer because I bought it while my battery was charging

I'm using Nexus 6P 6.0 and the app keeps crashing on me. I like the app design itself but the app is not stable. It scares me when I have the Phantom far away and I can't see where it's at. Please fix the crash issue
replyContent: It is fixed already, please make sure to use the Hardware (Android 6.0) video decoder setting.

content: You can do any shot/flight with this app, and in-app purchases. Frequent updates. Would like to see playbacks/caches, flight records. Video link is much more smoother than DJI Go. Had many app crashes though, need to test latest update. Nexus 7 2 Marshmallow
replyContent: please make sure to use the Hardware (Android 6.0) video decoder setting.

content: This app works very well and even better than the Dji Go.....only cons are that you cannot setup the camera for video and pictures...and also you cannot take picture while recording ( available only for panthom 2)....please add those features!!!!!!!!!
Good app out performs dji go app by a mile, don't like that you have in app purchases without a trail first

Now I give 4 Star because all features working Good in my P2V+ but Why I feel when use features in this app My Phantom Battrey Drain Fast ? And aometimes picture from camera not show (black Screen).. But I like this application than the original application from DJI..😉😊😊
I own a inspire1 and love the litchi App and it will only get better  Thanks Litchi

So I have tried the ground station and the point of interest and works pretty good, one time on point of interest it did not initiate, and one time out of 7 ground missions it did not initiate when I hit go. Update after using for 10 flights, the first person view is completely frozen now, well it works when it wants to, boost does no help lowered my score to two, follow me never works.  UPDATE 11/8.  they keep making app better...follow me works perfect now for phantom 2 vision plus.  ALL GROUND MISSIONS ARE WORKING PERFECT. they added couple more features, pano and something else, going to go fly and try rite now!! 2 NOW TO 4 STARS
Very stable on my tablet, two year old Dell, love the app. Wondering if there would be a black and white option it might be easier to use in the sunlight!
It's good to have an alternative to the first party DJI Go app.
Great app now and again Stops working. But on the hole a great acumpliment to my phantom

Update to my post.  The issue was not with the App.  Apparently, Google Maps would not update to the current release.  I removed the update...then re-installed the current update.  Works like a champ now.  Litchi Tech Support was fantastic.  Easy to communicate.  I purchased the app with high hopes.  The app could not give me the correct location of the controller.  I reset the system and drone several times.  I launched the DJI app and the location of the controller was right on the mark.  I can't afford to take a chance flying the drone knowing that the remote control is not where is shows it is on the map. Really was hoping this worked.
replyContent: Try setting your location device settings to GPS only, your nearby cell towers might be giving wrong location updates.

content: App crashed twice even before I took off. And I was not asked to pay. The program just downloaded and installed.
Would like to see the radar icon either larger or full screen selectable.  Great app with great features.

I installed it on Redmi Note 4G and the video lag kind of obvious than DJI GO. The video sometimes repeated the 1 second memory and need to restart. Please advise what setting or hardware changes needed for me if you think not compatible.
replyContent: Hi, Please refer to question #10 of the faq for possible solutions: http://flylitchi.com/help#faq-p3

content: I love the features in this app, especially the orbit and panorama features. But the app crashes on me too often. Several times each flight the app will suddenly quit. I can not use it due to the stability problems. Also failed to connect to validate my license when I was on a client flight in a remote location. Not reliable. Can't use for work.
replyContent:
For random crashes please refer to question #13 of the faq:  http://flylitchi.com/help#faq-p3
Sorry about the license check, this is something we try to do as little as possible, but it needs to be done sometimes to prevent the bad guys from using our app. Any chance you were abroad when this happened? (support@flylitchi.com)

content: We use this app outdoors in  bright light conditions. The screens are hard to see normally. Please make the icons and fonts at the top of the screen larger. And the little red plane in the bottom left of the screen looks like a little red dot. It is barely usable. Double touch screen to take a snapshot would be nice, hard to see and reach in there for the grey button when using a sun shade. Everything else is great. Help us old farts with limited vision, see what's going on with a dim  screen in bright sun.
Love this app,  better than DJI app.
You won't believe the functionality that litchi unlocks. Works perfectly on my Nexus 7 2013. Not a single glitch so far. The waypoint missions are worth the entry price alone. Fantastic software.

The DJI GO app works with Android but it is developed for IOS. Thinking of getting a dedicated iPad mini just for the Drone. If you have a phantom and prefer Android spend the money and use this app. I wish I had done it months ago.
NO firmwares to download to your drone. Cheap Vr goggles w /magnets(20$ via Wish App) works great with this app. Way points are true touch and go.

You have to buy a new bang up to date high end tablet to run this with any kind of reliability , older ones like the Samsung Tab-3 (Which run the DJI App fine) crash and fall over, forget 2yr old budget tablets like the Asus MemoPad-7  ..   This is a really good app which offers a lot on the right Mobile device but VC Tech really need a disclaimer about attempting to run it on less than premium hardware ..

Like the clear interface, shows  well in bright light. Voice feed back helps even more, allowing one to concentrate on flying and using the camera. No crashes at all so far on Gallery Tab S2. Look forward to further development.
where can i get the previous update this latest update put limits on my maximum altitude ......where can i acess the older version ???!!!
Never again come back 2 dji apps...this is amazing apps...just plug in seem eveything work perfectly..

The whole reason I got this app was so I could use it with my new Galaxy Gear VR. I even got an application disabler so I could disable the Gear VR app from opening when plugged into the headset. Found out the micro USB port on the bottom of the Gear VR headset isn't  just an extension of the original plug and therefore doesn't recognize when the phone is mounted. I'll keep researching ways around this but I think it's  just not compatible with Samsung Gear VR.
replyContent: As mentioned in the description, for the Gear Vr you may need to do a modification. A lot of users made it work by either drilling a hole on the opposite side and flipping the phone or by dismantling the gear vr usb port entirely.

content: Excellent App! Interface is superb and easy to navigate. Developer is quick to reply review comments - thanks to it I was able to find the debugging mode on can cause the app to crash. One star off as recently I was abroad with no mobile internet around and the  app refused to work as couldn't validate the licence. Hopefully this could be fixed with ie message/warning how many days are left before needing to re-validate the licence again.  Great piece of software!

I recently installed this app and tried it with my Samsung Gear VR for the S6 Edge.  I switched it to VR mode on the phone but once you plug the phone into the Gear VR the app becomes inaccessible.  I was unable to use the app with my Gear VR headset as advertised.
replyContent: Hi, a lot of users do use the Gear VR with Litchi, however you may need to drill a hole on the other side and flip the phone, or detach the USB port from the Gear VR. For more information please email support@flylitchi.com

content: Just installed Litchi for use with my P3P. I have only had chance to use it once but I have to say how impressed I am with what I have seen so far. Especially pleased with the amount of informative data available on the FLYLITCHI website - something not available with the 2 other apps that I have used. It's going to take a lot of reading but at least it is readily avaiable, For information, I am using a Nexus 7 tab which is "tethered" to my mobile phone
great app....works great on my HTC ONE M8. all features works great.. No issues so far. so it gets a full thumbs up!
So fat has been a great app
Since the latest update  im finding  the app crashes alot?
replyContent: Make sure USB debugging is off

content: Just set up my free fly vr googles. S6 and inspire 1. any chance you could make it work with dji naza flight controller? add a YouTube uplink.

I must say that I was skeptical that the software was worth the price. In 2 words... IT IS! I decided to buy this app because of all the firmware problems and limitations of the DJI software. The ease of creating a flight path and doing all of those things promised by the newest firmware update makes it easy for me to rate this app 5 stars.
Can you use this on the standard
replyContent: No you cannot, sorry it is not supported by the DJI development kit which we are using. They also recently announced that it is unlikely they will add support for it.

content: THIS app is AWESOME! Short learning curve. See YouTube reviews also. VERY STABLE app!
Great app for the P3! It does what it says it can do. The mission planner is worth the admission alone.
Very good app would be better if there was an album function to save from memory card to phone or to upload to web.
Best way to fly hands down.
Fantastic!
Cool
Awesome!!! No more video lag
Top class
Good stuff here!
I use Litchi all the time.
Simply the best android app for phantom
Does the job I would expect.  Well designed.
Awesome!!
replyContent: You can begin missions while in the ground if you have the "Automatic take off" setting enabled. The aircraft will first rise to 6m. Then fly direct to first WP. Mission will continue until the end if signal is lost.

content: Love it.

Excellent Groundstation functions & so much potential !. The app is easy to use, but It is well worth reading the online help to understand all the capabilities. Be aware that DJI have limited the GS functions in the DJI GO App to prevent people making silly mistakes. Litchi is so much more powerful - just make sure you have planned your mission to avoid any obstacles (like trees, buildings, etc).

If you're not willing to spend 14.99 to try out this AWESOME app, then you're probably not the person to own or buy an Inspire 1. This is a great price for an app that's 10 times better then DJI GO app. I will say DJI GO app does give more control over camera settings but if you're looking for autonomous flying that you can set up before take off, then this is the app!!!!!
Does exactly what it advertises. It makes my p3 feel like a brand new toy.

This is a great app if you had some information on how to use it. Symbols have locks on for some reason. Get error while trying orbit mode. If it won't work then there is little point in me having the app. No customer support on Web site. Please reply with a link to usable instructions. Web site help does not explain errors or why locks are on some symbols. Can't see any reply to this. Was in f mode still looking for usable instructions
replyContent: Hello, locks are just a symbol for the name of the mode (Course Lock, Home Lock etc). They are not locked as in disabled. They will only work if your RC is in F mode as the error says if you try to push them while in P mode. Send an email to support@flylitchi.com with the exact error message and we'll be happy to assist you solve your problems.

content: First Review for Phantom2 Vision +:  I flew my Phantom 2V+ for the first time today using Litchi app on my Nexus 7 (Gen2).   This app is hands down better than the DJI app.  The ease of use and bank turns in the GS mode alone makes this app worth the price.   The POI and follow-me modes are something that DJI should have had all along in their app.  I highly recommend this app.  I also own an Inspire 1 and I am waiting anxiously for Litchi to finish development and release their app for the Inspire. - - - - - - - - - - -  Second Review on new release for Inspire 1:  Great app.  DJI Go update with GS and Orbit modes is a joke.  Thanks, Litchi for providing these features and others that DJI should have provided with the release of the Inspire 1, last year. Keep up the good work.
Inspire 1
replyContent: Hi, you can do this in DJI Go, it will stick through.

content: Just started using the app and VERY impressed.  Gave four stars because you will need to spend additional money to upgrade app to use orbit function. This was the main reason I initially purchased it.  I wonder if there are other functions, I will have to pay extra for that I haven't discovered yet.
Slick and powerful!

My congratulations to the designers of this app, VC Technology!  What a great job they did in making this app work so well for my Inspire-1.  What a shame that DJI dropped the ball with their Go App, but lucky for us that this Litchi App works so well.  Great job guys and I appreciate your great customer support!

Great app for the control freak. Almost every option you could want for automation. Thankful for waypoint flying that you program ahead of time. What's the point of way point flying if you have to fly it first to create it (DJI)? One thing I would change in the follow me mode is an option to use mobile phone compass to keep from over-shooting the subject then having to spin around when stopping. It's like it loses heading when at a stop and doesn't know what to do.

This app is so much better than the dji app. It has all the functions it should have, unlike the dji pilot app. The way points are so easy to use. The best thing is...no more crashing app while flying. My dji pilot app we constantly crash while flying my inspire...not one crash with this app. Love it.
Love this program they got it right, easy to use right out of box.
Very well thought out and intuitive. Executes Nadir capture on grid very well. Poke at corners to get what you want from this app. When camera control is added it will be a solid 6

Can't rate this app yet because after purchase, so I give it 1 to submit my problem. It never connects to the network. I make sure I have wi-fi extender, radio and phantom on, and connected to the phantom by wi-fi before launching the app. It attempts to validate but says it cannot connect to the network. Please help! I have the 2 Vision+ and have tried to launch the app from a Samsung GS3 (which I use the DJI ground station app on) and the GS5, but no luck on either when trying to connect for the first time.  KC

The application looked useful however on my Nexus 6 device the application would cause the entire system to become sluggish and unresponsive.   My device has been working flawlessly with DJI Go before and after using  Litchi.  I tried killing all other applications before running Litchi however it had no noticeable effect.  I returned the application (within the two hour refund window) before I could investigate further.

Are you kidding me?? This app is amazing! I don't leave allot of reviews but this developer deserves it.  Excellent layout and thought behind how this program works,  doing everything I've always wanted to do with my phantom finally!! Well done!!!
Like the vr mode would like them to add more osd information on the vr mode like gets back to home
Get it you will love it!
Always had problems with the DJI app. All solved with this app. Just need camera settings and exposure level and this will be PERFECT !! Well done to the Dev team.
Stellar customer support.

Iv been using the Litchi app for some time now as well as the other apps available for the DJI range including the DJI GO app. This one is by far the best app, more modes and functions, less restrictions and best of all its the most reliable and most functional app out there! Definitely the no.1 DJI app! as many others will agree this one is the must buy if you have either of the phantom's or Inspire. Further developments and more features are being added soon which is exciting for all of us.
Best ground station app for the Phantom! The only caveat I have is the lack of camera controls but Litchi says that will be added in future versions...
Will there be photo mapping capabilities like in ground station for p2's?
It does EVERYTHING DJI SHOULD have built into their software.  I'd been waiting for POI since I bought my P2V+.  DJI has failed to provide.  But Litchi was able to fill that need handily.
replyContent: You should not be required to buy it again as long as you are using the same google account

content: Dev is the most responsive, most tireless I've ever seen! The app unlocks options that DJI's own does not. Only neg at the moment is you do not have a way to change camera settings--yet. I think they'll eventually get there but for now you need GO app to do that.
Great App/Developer!

I have been testing this app for months with great delight. This app does it all,, ground station with lots of options  (point of interest, banked radius turns). Programed Orbit with manual RC controls added. Follow me mode with a separate mobil device to follow. Just a incredible App. !!!
I must say it's one of the best functioning apps for the Phantom 3 or Inspire.  I think it blows the DJI app away.  Now I need to get a better android.
Was very disappointed with such limited waypoints functionality in the DJI app released today. This works awesome!

Very powerful app for autonomous flights.  Works very well and is packed with features.  For autonomous flights (Groundstation, Orbit, and Follow)  this app is much better than DJI's product and even just flying around, the HW Decode makes for much better video streaming than DJI Go, or the other competing app.
Most responsive dev!
Best for the money.

Bought the latest addition and although I was iniatially excited by the POI addition..soon evaporated when my drone made its first.circuit and on and on and..you get my.point.  worse after about 5min I hoped to perform the power off and pray manuever. When I discovered No Dice I started looking for "safe" place I might have Crash it

Very happy so far.   When using "Follow Me"  Phantom loses GPS lock and will just stay in "Hover" mode.  Reset numerous times to continually have the same end result.   Using the Litchi app exclusively w/ my Dji Phantom Vision 2 + and my Samsung Galaxy Note 4.   Wish Litchi would address and update.   Also doesn't connect to mapping all the time.   For the money I paid for app, just looking for more.
Good
Keep up the great work. So much better than stock app :)

It worked well in FPV mode, then I set it to follow me mode. The quad followed me for a few meters, tgen stopped and started drifting to one side. Switching back to FPV didn't work, I was unable to regain control. After a few minutes my quad drifted into a tree and crashed leaving me with a bill for damaged gimbal (£450!)...
The new POI function is amazing , the best app for the phantom.
Very good app.  Allows for strategic planning of shots. POI, Banked turn features make it a joy to use.  Really want to know when the VR cardboard Fpv will be released? Can I get a beta?
replyContent:
Hi, you can test the VR mode in the alpha version, email vctech@flylitchi.com for instructions.
We have not released it yet as we are having issues with the video stream with some devices.

content: Works perfectly and has a great UI.  PO I is well worth the money
I already buy this app. but cannot connect to phantom 3. this app support phantom 3? because i see on your youtube account this app support p3. thanks.
replyContent:
Please do not rate the app for the P3 when it is clear that the release version of the app does not support the P3 yet (title itself says for DJI Phantom 2).
The P3 version (same app) is in testing and will be released when it's ready, if you're interested in testing, send an email to vctechplus@gmail.com

content: Great app. Love it but have found some issues.1. FPV video freezes when photo is taken during recording. 2. POI paid the extra , however today I tried app on other device and gave error message saying already bought . But the POI feature wouldn't initialise. Please fix and I'll update to 5 stars.
replyContent:
Make sure you're using a compatible resolution and fov to take pictures while recording (1080p 30fps and medium/large fov works for example). Freezes will be fixed soon.
Regarding POI, try to clear the cache of the Google Play Services app, restart the device, and it should work. If not, please email vctechplus@gmail.com for further help.

content: Used this app to send my drone on a mission. It never came back again. Why don't you have a find my phantom?? £1000 down the drain
replyContent:
Very sorry to hear this.
You can see the last GPS coordinates the app received in the flight log at the last line (flight logs are stored in the mobile device, in the "LitchiApp/flightlogs" folder).
If you need help figuring out where these coordinates are on a map please email vctechplus@gmail.com.

content: Great, thanks so much

Ok so this a great app and I love it but all, of a sudden camera wont work on auto start or normal mode please help. runing samsung note 10.1 android 4.1                                                             UPDATE..... HAD TO RE-INSTALL ALL IS WILL AGAIN.!
replyContent:
Make sure no background apps are running, especially DJI Vision. Make sure you can see the video in DJI Vision too to rule out a possible hardware issue.
Try to lower preview resolution if the problem continues.

content: As usual, using this app regularly for my flying needs. Is it possible to include 25 fps?? Thx
replyContent: We will add it soon.

content: The banked turns are excellent. That feature plus the cached maps and simple waypoint editor makes this the best Ground Station app I have used.
It's good
This app works perfectly the POI is just what I was looking for  great app
Great improvements over any other apps available.  Clear intuitive interface

I have purchased this app and the additional plug ins and have used it now 5 times. I love the interface and the options that you have put into it.  The POI is just what I was looking for, but I have a few glitches that are occurring wondering if you could advise me.  I seem to be freezing up, meaning the app will freeze and no buttons or options are available and the video feed freezes. I have been closing the app down completely during flight and reopening in order to get the app to become operational?  I even loose control of the quad with the stick on the DJI controller?  I cannot find the go home button during POI, it does not seem to exist?  Is is also not allowing me to capture still shots during video capture.  It makes the camera noise but there are no pictures saved to the card?  I have read that there have been others who have struggled with the follow me option, I too am not able to make this feature work. I have my phone set to the highest sensitivity and accuracy in its GPS mode but can't seem to get the follow me feature to connect/work?  If there's any informational booklet or location where I can receive some additional user information it would be great.
How can I download pitcures/videos from the drone straight to my phone? Thanks
replyContent:
Hi, You cannot do this with Litchi at this time.
We may add it in the future but for now you will need to use DJI Vision if you want to preview recently taken videos and pictures directly on your mobile device.

content: The functionality of this app is great. But can i request add in motor running timer to further monitoring battery status.
Best app on my phone, best developer around.

replyContent: Hi, please see http://www.technipages.com/google-play-download-unsuccessful-error-fix

content: Follow me is too slow. Seems to be maxed at 12 kmph.
replyContent: The max follow me speed is limited by DJI, please see http://flylitchi.com/faq#follow

content: Awsome app

Helpful & fast response from the developer. Sent me older version until a fix is available. Original review; Paid for app and poi, and crashes as soon as I press poi, gs, follow me. What a waste of money
replyContent: This is a known issue with the DJI development kit 2.0 that happens on certain devices, anyone with this issue please email vctechplus@gmail.com for a short term solution.

content: I have waited two years for the POI obstacles within the DJI SYSTEM to be solved. Hurrah for Mr. Kaehn!  Well done!
POI is an extra 3.70$USD for some reason... Very disappointed.
Very good app. So much better than oem! Feature packed and awesome support. BEST APP I've used with my Phantom!
Awesome !
Follow me option is very easy and accurate with Phantom 2 Vision, signal booster work great.

Follow me mode still does not work well. It says gps signal not locked but i have none or ten satellites. Also the phantom 2 shows the green signal light for gps signal and calibration locked in. Please fix this. Would love to try this
replyContent:
The "gps not locked" message relates to your mobile device's GPS signal, not the phantom.
You can adjust the "location accuracy" in the settings to be higher, but generally follow me will only be good is the accuracy of your mobile device's GPS signal is within 5 meters.

content: Great App & Great Developer!  First, and perhaps most importantly the developer is responsive and actually cares about his customer's experience. Throughout all of IOS-and-Android-Land I've never encountered such an exceptional level of service. The app, well, hands down the best I've seen or read about for my Phantom 2 Vision+ and Android. The app works well with my Nexus 7 (2nd gen) on Lollipop 5.1.1  Flight logs are included (not an "in-app purchase"), and, along with video recording, are auto-start and auto-stop/save for the forgetful type like myself. They work flawlessly with DashWare right out of the box. To have a permanent record of each flight's parameters is important to me. The wifi boost for FPV is also automatic and may be configured to your preferences. The split-screen (PIP) is swappable between the map view and camera FPV.  Ground Station missions may be pre-planned on the developer's website, which is a nice feature.  UPDATE 6/12/15: Ground Station worked perfectly when tested.

A great replacement for the stock DJI Vision app.   Removes ground station limits, the split screen works great.  The design is very well laid out.   Love the ability to save waypoints.  The "Follow me" works very well with my Phantom 2 Vision+ . Keep up the good work!

So far it looks good. Looks like the display for my vision 3. Video gets choppy and locks when only 600ft away 120ft up. . Had to put into airplane mode to stay connected to it's wifi. Follow me did not work. Something about GPS not locked. Good thing there. I don't dare try automotion if it's locking. All in all it's getting there. Galexy note 3 - lollipop

I am using the app with my DJI P2V+. I fly in NAZA Mode and have tested COURSE Lock and HOME Lock as well as FAILSAFE and had zero problems. I had a surprise the other day and see that the app has been updated to remove a bug in using Follow Me when flying with version v3.14 of DJI's firmware. I am looking forward to testing that feature as well as Ground Station. I have conducted my testing using a Nexus 7 tablet running Android 5.1.1. IMPORTANT UPDATE to my initial review . . . VC Tech you were right! Although my Nexus 7 does not have an SD card slot it does store flight logs and Ground Station missions within my device as you advised.. It was an oversight on my part. The flight data logging is way cool!! AEWSOME App!!
replyContent:
To clarify, you do not need an external SD card, just an internal one, which most if not all Android devices have.
You should still be able to access the logs and save GS missions on your nexus 7.

content: I downloaded the app, when I open the app I don't seem to be able to close it as it take up the whole screen including the home button. To close the app I need to restart my phone.
replyContent:
You should be able to swipe up from the bottom of the screen to show the system buttons.
Likewise, to show the status/notification bar, swipe down from the top of the screen.

content: Great app ! Superbe application !
Bought this app a few weeks back and really like it. Not tested waypoints or anything other than normal flight yet but seems great! Doesn't seem to take stills whilst recording now though....
replyContent: Make sure that you are using 1080p 30 fps, and you should be able to take photos while recording. Not all recording resolutions are supported.

content: I really love this app more features than the stock but only thing that has me with this is it sometimes has signal issues and says Batt error which I don't have ever before and during my flight when I'm out which ever distance the app turns off and closes by its self which scares the hell out of me... Please it needs more work but a awesome app... Plus also I notice that when I use the original app to take off my pics and Vids it crashes with the original dji app and then I can't fly no more till reinstall
I love everything this app has to offer but the time lapse feature does not work on my galaxy tablet. Also,  a GPS coordinate read out for way points that are set would be nice.
replyContent: We have some fixes on the way for timelapse

content: Only used this a couple times but have no issues with it.  More than worth the price. Better telemetry than the DJI app, plus you get a data recorder and WiFi booster included.

Just after I downloaded the app to my phone I went out to test the app.  This app is simply amazing!  I does everything I wanted and more than the app released by DJI for the Phantom 2 Vision+.  The smart connection option too is just awesome.  If there are any people like me that were sceptical about this app don't be.  I am using Phantom 2 Vision+ and running app on my Samsung Gaxaly S6 Edge running stock 5.0.2 Lollipop.  Keep up the great work!
Can you download pics and vids while flying?
replyContent: You can't with this app. We'd like to add this in a future update but our efforts are currently focused on the follow mode.

content: Does it work with inspire 1 ?
replyContent: It does with the alpha version, will be released soon.

content: So far, so good.   I gave it four stars because I need to use it a few more times, and if it continues to perform well, I definitely will give it a five. I love the auto record.

I read the other people's ratings so I figured it would be a pretty good app for my phantom but wow was I wrong. Fpv is horrible, camera adjustment is impossible to do, the boost is terrible. My regular fpv goes further than this one does. Don't get it.
It's Amazing! !!!! +++++
This is a great app. The creator is always quick to respond to questions and implement new features and changes if possible.
Works great! The follow me mode is pretty cool, it also angles the camera at you automatically. The range booster didn't seem to make a huge difference but perhaps it was the area I was in.

After about 20 flights now I can say it is a good almost great app. The boost works amazing. All the features are great. Only thing keeping it a 4 stars is I still get at least one force close every flight. It always reconnects on relaunch of the app but if that gets fixed it will be golden.   Running Galaxy Note 3 with official lollipop 5.0.1
Works great.
Wish I could go from go home to flying again when connection is reestablished instead of having to land her.

Just like the title says. The app keeps crashing everything the WiFi booster is enabled. The app will only stay active for about 5 mins before crashing. If it weren't for this issue...I would have given this app all 5 stars. Instead it gets two because it costs quite a bit and I can't use the main feature I bought it for. I would be willing to re-rate this app if the issue is fixed.
replyContent:
We have had no other reports of the FPV boost crashing the app, are you using a Vision or Vision +?
We would like to fix your crash, please send us an email so we can follow up.

content: How can i watch the video or pics that I took pls help
replyContent: Hi, you cannot do it yet with the Vision Plus app, you either need to transfer the files from your SDCard to your computer, or you can use the official app to browse the pictures and videos you've taken. We will add this feature in the future.

content: Love this app, it's clean and tidy and offers much more then the standard app. It looks very much like the dji pilot/Phantom 3 app, love it, keep up the good work.
Great app and really dynamic dev team with frequent updates and rapid responses on the discussion group. Go on this way!

This is one of the better apps I’ve used for the Vision+.  It has the same look and feel as the DJI Pilot App for the Inspire.  Uses the DJI SDK of course, and improvements are being made daily.  I requested a Battery Bar Feature similar to the DJI Pilot App from the developer, and the developer responded immediately.  I’m all in on this one. :o)  Keep up the great work!!
Great App! Found no problems so far and  GS works very well and is easy to use.
Love this app. This is what I dream for.

It's a lot more streamlined than the DJI app. I found one bug and let the developer know about it and later that day he had a solution and should be publishing today. Impressed with how responsive the developer is.
I love the full screen view and ground station works perfectly, can go as far as I want which is nice .
Great app. Keep up the good work.
Most polished of any of them out there at the moment
